original_title: Man hospitalized after shooting in Kotahena
original_body_lines: An individual has been admitted to the Colombo National Hospital following a shooting on Paramananda Road in Kotahena.
Accordingly, the driver of a three-wheeler had been injured after two persons had arrived on a motorcycle and opened fire, Police Spokesman SSP Nihal Thalduwa stated.
He further noted that a cause for the shooting is yet to be determined.
